# brikz
A hack on Duplo bricks to repurpose them in a gamified way for early learning education and challenging for the parents also!


# Project dependencies
 - [Android studio canary](https://developer.android.com/studio/preview/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMI-bGz8rij7AIVkqkYCh28ygmxEAAYASAAEgLgqPD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds)
 - [Jetpack compose](https://developer.android.com/jetpack/compose)
 - [Wikitude](https://www.wikitude.com/external/doc/documentation/latest/androidnative/setupguideandroidnative.html#project-setup)


## Wikitude 

### SDK KEY

```kotlin
private const val WIKITUDE_SDK_KEY =
    ""

```

### Where should I enter the license key
- [Where should I enter the license key](https://www.wikitude.com/external/doc/documentation/latest/androidnative/triallicense.html#where-should-i-enter-the-license-key)
